snippet: Top-seeded Maria Sharapova thrashed eighth-seeded Kirsten Flipkens of Belgium 6-2, 6-2 on Friday to set up an all-Russian semifinal against Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova at the Open Gaz de France....

headline.print_headline: Sharapova and Pavlyuchenkova Reach Open GDF Semis
headline.main: Sharapova and Pavlyuchenkova Reach Open GDF Semis

lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Maria Sharapova thrashed eighth-seeded Kirsten Flipkens of Belgium 6-2, 6-2 on Friday to set up an all-Russian semifinal against Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova at the Open Gaz de France.
